name: Duty 1 - Castle Guard
description:
You have been hired by Resto Corp to work as a night guard in a castle in India. The castle is being rebuilt and will be open to the general public in few weeks. But the castle is said to be haunted by the locals. You have to monitor all the activities that occur in the castle during night time using the camera system. and report it to the company by the end of the week. 

Close doors, flash entities, turn the lights on, wind the music box, switch between cameras. Survive every night till 6AM.
